metadata.title: Watch Bob Bondurant Win The 1965 FIA World Manufacturers’ GT Championship | Motorious.com
metadata.description: This video is part of a documentary in development about Bob Bondurant.
metadata.author: Amie Williams

metadata.title: CO Ford Dealer Employee Crashes 2020 Mustang GT During Joyride | Motorious.com
metadata.description: And the dealership’s was positive enough that it didn’t lose a customer from this ordeal!
metadata.author: Jeffrey N. Ross

sections: Your open-wheel racing dreams are about to come true.
In an official press release, the
High Performance Driving School officially announced the launch of a Formula 4 open-wheel race car training program. While before the school would train students on driving sports and
, now enthusiasts and semi-professional/professional drivers can learn to drive a single-seat, open-wheel, modern race

This isn’t just any racing school, but rather is the official school of the F4 U.S. Championship. As a result, students will get to use the same Ligier JS F4 car with Honda engine as what professional drivers pilot in the FIA-supported championship. In other words, it’s as close as you can get to driving in an F4 event without actually being in one. You can’t go to another driving school in the United States and have access to such a car.

According to Ligier Automotive North America Chief Executive Officer Max Crawford, it was Bondurant High Performance Driving School’s stellar track record for emphasizing safety, as well as the excellent instruction which helped this partnership come about. The long-standing relationship with SCCA Pro Racing probably didn’t hurt, either.

Scheduling of these F4 classes begin next month, so it’s time to check your calendar and make tentative plans. There will be several course options to cater to both enthusiasts and race drivers. The skills learned can help make you more competitive on the track. Courses can also help with obtaining an SCCA Pro Racing License.
Located in Phoenix, Arizona not too far from the Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport and with a hotel just down the street, the
High Performance Driving School has been a popular destination for people from around the United States and elsewhere. This new program will surely add to its popularity.
